thread.title: Avino 2017 Silver Equivalent Production Of 2,700,585 OZ

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Avino 2017 Silver Equivalent Production Of 2,700,585 OZ

organizations.name: reuters) - avino silver & gold mines ltd

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Avino Silver & Gold Mines Ltd:
* AVINO PROVIDES 2017 YEAR END SUMMARY AND OUTLOOK FOR 2018
* AVINO SILVER & GOLD MINES LTD - 2017 SILVER EQUIVALENT PRODUCTION OF 2,700,585 OZ
* AVINO SILVER & GOLD MINES LTD - IN 2018, CAPITAL EXPENDITURES AT AVINO AND SAN GONZALO ARE ESTIMATED TO TOTAL US$14.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
